ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Digest Number 366
ygData.msgSnippet: I think Yak stated a couple months back that the Gemcutter was originally intended to be used in a Paladin quest, but that the quest was never added.  Hence,
ygData.messageBody:
I think Yak stated a couple months back that the Gemcutter was
originally intended to be used in a Paladin quest, but that the quest was
never added. Hence, it is a useless, though quite profitable, item.

Calbasil Psyrex of Ak'Anon (TT)


At 08:49 PM 6/15/2001 , you wrote:
>I would highly doubt that since the gemcutter was in the game long before
>them gems.
>But try anyway... try everything...
>You never know.
>----- Original Message -----

>To: <EQ_Tinkering@yahoogroups.com>

>Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Digest Number 366
